rule: The output should be enclosed in curly braces '{' and '}' instead of square brackets.
input: Abstract: Introducing the model DataAnalyzer for big data.
validityText:

Following "Abstract: ", there is the text "Introducing the model DataAnalyzer for big data." This sentence is a text string and fits the expectation of representing an abstract of a machine learning paper. The presence of the model name "DataAnalyzer" is in accordance with the specification, which states that the input may contain model names. The length of the text is not restricted by the specification, hence an abstract of any length is allowed. The language used in the text is English, aligning with the input specification's requirement for the input to be in English. There are no rules or conditions violated by the provided text.

No violation.
